snippet.title: NES Longplay [549] Rainbow Islands: The Story of Bubble Bobble II (Ocean) (EU)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Lemmy556

Like all Ocean ports of Rainbow islands, this version is faithful to the original arcade versions design, but lacks the 3 secret islands.

Collecting the 7 diamonds is harder in Nes version.The enemies must land on specific spots to produce a diamond. Even after collecting all the diamonds, I end up getting the ending with treasures(bad ending in arcade port). After boss battles I usually get big grapes or green diamonds from chests so I believe the developers added just one ending and didnt care about the diamond part that much.

The time is also very limited in this version (Euro) and the rising water can be the biggest problem in the whole game!Theres one example at the very end of this longplay! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
